Kakslauttanen Arctic Resort - Igloos and Chalets
7 Very good
Based on 30 reviews

Horrible service! in fact, there is NO service after paying more than SGD 500 per night for the igloo stay.

If you want to have your luggage with you in the room, you have to lug it by yourself across the muddy gravel road for 10mins. ZERO amenities in the igloo. Not even hot water. we are told to drink from the tap. Totally will not recommend to honeymooners!

Show more
Stephanie , Singapore
Hotel Helka
8.5 Excellent
Based on 274 reviews

excellent hotel you can lost your position is close to all necesary things (food-train station-basic trams line-shopping malls-and port)the breakfast is good the family rooms is very big with all the extras(internet-flat tv-and relaxing beds).

the staff is very nice and help you at any time you needed.very clean hotel and the price that you pay is not much for that you give you.i forgot the sauna please try it is the best and tradional and free.they have free wi-fi internet.i recomented to you.

Show more
yiannis , Cyprus
Hilton Helsinki Airport
8.7 Excellent
Based on 501 reviews

It was perfect the moment when I stepped in the hotel till the last min I checked out. The staff were super helpful, took the effort to provide me details to Tallinn at 4am.

. Provided me with all the details that I need to know. Always smiling and nice greetings. The room is fantastic, very spacious and clean. The toilet is awesome. It has everything that I need. It is a good location if you are only staying for a few nights in Helsinki. Airport shuttle takes you all the way to the city centre and it is very convenient. I will defintely stay there again, no second thoughts.

Show more
Jasmin , Singapore
Arctic TreeHouse Hotel
7.7 Very good
Based on 14 reviews

Radisson Blu Plaza Hotel Helsinki
8.7 Excellent
Based on 158 reviews

This was my second stay, and it was even better than my first! Two reasons: I just checked out of the Sokos Presidentti, and the comparison between our room in the Sokos and our room in the Radisson was like night and day! And I think they have two wings, with two sets of elevators, and one wing is OK (my last visit), and the other wing (this visit) has big, lovely rooms.

Maybe I accidentally got a superior room this stay, and a standard room last trip. It was great! Overall, it's hard to fault this hotel, and it's probably a good first choice for a downtown Helsinki hotel.

Show more
gwyn , United Kingdom
Anna Hotel
8 Very good
Based on 186 reviews

Hotel is centrally located, about 15 min walk from city centre. There are kiosk, night shops and some restaurant in the area.

Single room is not big but a normal size for a budget hotel. Room has free wifi, tv and minibar. Prices are also quite cheap for hotel standard (EUR 2 for a can of coca cola). In short good value for money !

Show more
Didon , Indonesia
Santa's Igloos Arctic Circle
8.5 Excellent
Based on 17 reviews

Hotel Inari
8.7 Excellent
Based on 84 reviews

(1)No lifts provided and I have to take my two heavy luggages up two levels. (2) Wifi reception is poor due to narrow broadband with large nos.

of guests using it. Besides, the wifi system was down for more than one day though I have informed the reception immediately. (3) Except I told the staff the malfunction of wifi system, they are helpful and nice.

Show more
WAI , Hong Kong
Hilton Helsinki Strand
8.2 Excellent
Based on 170 reviews

I stayed at this location for 2 night and thoroughly enjoyed my stay. The staff are so friendly and speak excellent english.

There is a buffet available on saturdays for 29 euros... food tasted good. . The gym is tiny. there are like 2 upper body weigh machines and 2 legs machines. The picture advertised on the website makes it look so much bigger. the pool is not heated and bloody freezing and the saunas are small and can only be used certain hours. . Overall it is about 15-20min walk to the centre of town. 20min to the olympic standard and has excellent rooms. the rooms are big and spacious just like a hilton should be. the bed is very comfy and the bathroom is clean and tidy. . I recommend this stay as it was cheap at the time i went

Show more
Glenn , Australia
Hotel Klaus K
8.3 Excellent
Based on 118 reviews

Very chic looking place well designed though you must get your luggage up a set of stairs if there is no bell man present.

Rooms are satisfactory visually, but the air conditioning is actually an air cooling system, which is a fancy way of saying that the hotel sets a temperature and you can control within 1 or 2 degrees of their setting, or so they say. With the record summer heat in Europe, I made it all of 3 hours before I could not longer withstand the 25 degree heat in the room. I checked out and was charged a 20 Euro cleaning fee. Staff was as helpful as possible.

Show more
paul , United States
Arctic Glass Igloos
8 Very good
Based on 13 reviews

Hotel Haven
9 Excellent
Based on 88 reviews

Very nice room with big bathroom. Reception staff extremely friendly. Staff at the breakfast were not friendly.

. they didn´t automaticly help with buggies and one didn´t feel welcome to their restaurant. Breakfast in it self was really tasty but everything was all the time finished and replenishment was slow! That was really the only downside of this hotel.

Show more
veera , Finland
Radisson Blu Royal Hotel Helsinki
8.3 Excellent
Based on 105 reviews

The hotel is well located and looks very smart from the outside. But the Roma are small and poky, very basically furnished and could do with a good spring clean and some TLC.

There are few amenities and the breakfast is not particularly good value for the high price. Check in and check out was quite slow - not enough staff on duty at reception. It was handy for our needs but wouldn't rush back here again.

Show more
Philip , United Kingdom
Radisson Blu Seaside Hotel Helsinki
8.1 Excellent
Based on 118 reviews

We had only a 25hr stopover in Helsinki and this hotel was in a nice location by the sea and only a 10 min walk to all the city attractions.

The breakfast was amazing - a huge selection of delicious food. The room was clean, bed was comfortable and service was great. It took us 1hr by public transport to get there from the airport - 35 min on bus 615, 5 min walk to Hakaneima metro, about 4 stops then walk 10 min walk to hotel. If you have kids, heavy luggage or are not very fit, I would suggest you take a cab here. Once at the hotel is easy to walk everywhere I would recommend this hotel.

Show more
Danielle , Australia
Holiday Inn Helsinki City Centre
8.4 Excellent
Based on 260 reviews

Comfortable Hotel, with helpful staff. Coffee and tea are provided in the room. There is underground supermarket in the train station so can buy everything there.

Sauna is available to use free of charge. Wifi is extra 2.8 Euro, not a lot but it is frustrated to use because username and password are not easy to put in and must try at least twice before can lock on. Room key is also another annoying item, it's an art to insert the key. Even the staff admit that and there is nothing they can do.

Show more
chongkonnee , Thailand
Clarion Hotel Helsinki Airport
8.9 Excellent
Based on 20 reviews

Hotel Kämp
8.8 Excellent
Based on 48 reviews

Hotel Arthur
7.7 Very good
Based on 301 reviews

since i was travelling alone and only needed a room for one night, i chose arthur for 60€. the staff was very friendly and lication ok, but the rooms.

.. not ok. very small room and especially the shower! i am very small myself but even i couldn't use the shower curtain because it took too much space from the tiny shower corner. the restaurant was a little bit shabby and had an odd smell. but the fish soup was great and only! if you're looking for a cheap room and don't have any expectations, i guess arthur is your choice. but next time i will definitely spend more and choose another hotel.

Show more
Lisa , Finland
Airport Hotel Bonus Inn
7.7 Very good
Based on 67 reviews

We stayed there in late July when it was very hot and humid. Our room did not have air conditioning or even a fan.

The lobby and halls did but not our room.. There wasn't any bar soap, shampoo or lotions. And of course, no wash cloths, which is an unknown item to Europeans. The restaurant was open for dinner when we arrived until 11:00 pm and was very good. However, we were late for the breakfast buffet which ended at 9:30 am and the restaurant was closed. The free shuttle service to the airport was a plus.

Show more
Ann , United States
Hotelli Kultahippu
8.2 Excellent
Based on 62 reviews

Ivalo is pretty small, so within town everything is within walking distance. Opposite the hotel is a supermarket and alko.

If you do not want to have your meals at the hotel, there are a few food options nearby. Hotel is about 10 min taxi ride from the airport (about 23- 25 Euros). Rooms were cosy, clean and comfortable. Has cable TV but limited channels. Breakfast was decent, typical finnish hotel breakfast. Staff were friendly.

Show more
Edwin , Singapore
Glo Hotel Art
8.2 Excellent
Based on 69 reviews

Hotel showed great hospitality, the staff was helpful, and there was even a sleep menu where one could choose from different types of pillows! Room was nice, clean and well-designed, but a little warm though (perhaps better than being cold).

Breakfast was good and had a healthy spread of food. Hotel was within walking distance from the main train station, shopping areas, design district and it was easy to get the shuttle bus to the airport. Overall, highly recommended!!!!

Show more
PEI , Singapore
Crowne Plaza Helsinki
8.4 Excellent
Based on 66 reviews

Nice design all over, the room was clean and attractive, very good bed, nice bathroom with tub/shower combination, free Internet access.

The hotel looked freshly renovated, staff was friendly and it is close to the city center (10 min walk), the Sibelius Park (ditto), and there is another-park-with-lake right across the street. There are several nice restaurants right around the corner. The airport shuttle stops right outside, but you should tell the driver that you want this hotel because they only list the next-door Scandic Hotel (go figure).

Show more
Unni , Norway
Hotel F6
9.2 Exceptional
Based on 7 reviews

Scandic Grand Marina
8.2 Excellent
Based on 108 reviews

It would be my first choice to stay there if coming back to Helsinki but outside the hotel in the local area there is not much.

The local bar and local shop are both noticeably extremely expensive - it seems to me to be everything on that island is. However, it is well connected to the main land and tram 4 serves it well. There is only a short walk to the promanade and a market is available some days.

Show more
Kevin , United Kingdom
Tradition Hotel Kultahovi Inari
8.3 Excellent
Based on 37 reviews

We spent two nights in this hotel. We chose this hotel because it is near Inari lake (Next to Hotel Inari) and easy to chase northern light.

We are so lucky and two nights also caught the northern light. We have our own car and it is convenience to park. The room is quite small but everything is well equipped. Computer is available in the corridor which is very important to check the Northern light photos. I will recommend this hotel!

Show more
HiuChi , Hong Kong
Glo Hotel Kluuvi
8.8 Excellent
Based on 198 reviews

I was in Helsinki for a wedding and had a fantastic stay at Glo. We cheked in 6 hours early and the staff were helpful in getting us a room and even upgrading.

Pay the extra for the 3 different sauna's (30 euros / night I believe). We needed to get somewhere for a couple of hours and the staff gave us the Glo mini car FREE of charge and even told us they would pay for the gas. They have bikes for free as well, and internet and computer for free in the lobby. The room was incredible, large, comfortable, modern - I would recommend this hotel to ANYONE, I have stayed in a lot of nice hotels, but this is definitely in the top 3!

Show more
Matthew , Canada
Cumulus City Kaisaniemi Helsinki
8 Very good
Based on 72 reviews

this hotel is situated in a very central of helsinki but also in the very quiet corner. so it won't be too busy.

nice size hotel, friendly staffs, nice food. the room was really nice and clean. soft bed and extra pillows always available. free internet connection with the wire. the most complicated thing i found is how to work the lift with the card. the guests seem to sharing this same problems. a lot of mature guests (+60 years old) around (though i am not quite sure whether this is their marketing). there is also the luggage room available.

Show more
Tanatchaporn , Thailand
Hotel Seurahuone Helsinki
8.2 Excellent
Based on 76 reviews

I thought this hotel is excellent! I am staying here for 1 night and decided to check the reviews which were shocking.

Firstly, its still summer time and the weather is pretty cooling definitely. In any case, theres a window that i can open for cool air. Perhaps some rooms have no windows? Secondly, mine was just a basic room and definitely i wasnt told about an upgrade. For a solo traveler, the room size was perfect with nice furnishings. The windows look out to the main street which was perfect. The only cons would be 1)The tiny bathroom but again, good enough for me. 2)No water provided and no drinks inside the fridge- I had nothing to drink in the middle of the night. In all, i have no complaints.

Show more
Kah , Singapore
Original Sokos Hotel Helsinki
7.9 Very good
Based on 113 reviews

We enjoyed our stay in this nice hotel located very close to the central railway system. It is surrounded by pedestrian walking areas and excellent shopping and restaurants.

Also a short walk to the waterfront. The room (we had a triple) was large with a very large bathroom, comfortable, and reasonably quiet. Would stay there again. Access to the railway station meant we could use a bus to get to the airport which saved a great deal of money without giving up much convenience.

Show more
william , Canada
Santa Claus Holiday Village
8.6 Excellent
Based on 168 reviews

We can't get Wi-Fi in our room as the reception said that the server in our room area was broken and we can only gain Internet access at the restaurant area.

Private sauna room is good, very small kitchen area with microwave stove, for coffee and tea, the room is clean and spacious. However, the setting of the furniture is strange. The TV was on the wall immediately above our pillows. The sofa was not facing the TV and the chairs of the dining table were not facing the TV either. If one has to watch TV, he/she must turn his/her back to watch!

Show more

Lapland Hotels Ounasvaara Chalets
8.5 Excellent
Based on 18 reviews

Loikansaari Lomamökit Holiday Cottages

Davvi Arctic Lodge
5.4 Review score
Based on 73 reviews

Ruoke Holiday Village
9.1 Exceptional
Based on 53 reviews

Saariselkä Inn Majatalo Panimo
7.7 Very good
Based on 40 reviews

Sarriselka is a small village for skiing in winter. It has a bus comes from Ivalo/Inari, and go to Rovaniemi(Santa Village).

The bus stop is just opposite to the hotel. If you take bus from Inari, I think you can get off by the opposite bus stop. But if you get off in another bus station earlier, it will take 5-10 mins walk. The Inn is opposite to the Holiday Club Saariselka Hotel. It if definitely good for budget traveller.

Show more
Christine , Hong Kong
Guesthouse Borealis
7.7 Very good
Based on 53 reviews

It was a good stay. Quiet and the location is fantastic. Just up the hill from the train station and about 500m from the bus station.

It is easy to walk to the city centre at approximately 20 mins. There is also the bus stop 8 which is the tourist one that is 100 m from the hotel. A nice breakfast is included with yogurt, musli, cookies, cereal. The room was simple and clean with attached bathroom.

Show more

It is a kind of apartment accommodation, located within residential floors. After 4pm the reception is closed and they will arrange the key pickup (correspondence by email), which was in my case at the airport and well done and received.

The apartment is abt a 15min walk away from the railway station. It was a little hard to find the apartment itself, since it was a bit hidden (block C was behind a garage door). The apartment (32C77) was hotel room size, but offered everything, so you could do self-catering. The room was clean.

SATO HotelHome Kristianinkatu
8.2 Excellent
Based on 33 reviews

The apartment is spacious and full with cooking facilities. The location is at walking distance to nearby attractions and public transports.

The accessibility to the apartment however, is a bit complicated as they will send you pin code and apartment number separately in the email 4 hours before check-in time. This is a bit problematic for people who travel from oversea and have no access to internet before check-in time. I had to call before hand to get the apartment number and the staff was very helpful. Overall, the apartment is great and cosy.

More about Finland

If you are looking for a holiday destination in Europe, then Finland is the place to go, offering something for everyone. Cheap hotel rates are not always easy to come by, but Agoda.com features the best available rates at more than 1912 hotels in Finland. You can be sure to find the most up-to-date information and hotel deals here. While you're there, be sure to explore the different regions, including Lapland, Uusimaa, Northern Ostrobothnia. Oh and whatever you do, Helsinki, Rovaniemi, Inari are great cities to visit. Agoda.com offers a great range of irresistible hotel deals. Feel free to browse through our numerous hotels for the best online rates.

Show more Stephanie , Singapore Hotel Helka 8.5 Excellent Based on 274 reviews excellent hotel you can lost your position is close to all necesary things (food-train station-basic trams line-shopping malls-and port)the breakfast is good the family rooms is very big with all the extras(internet-flat tv-and relaxing beds). the staff is very nice and help you at any time you needed.very clean hotel and the price that you pay is not much for that you give you.i forgot the sauna please try it is the best and tradional and free.they have free wi-fi internet.i recomented to you. Show more yiannis , Cyprus Hilton Helsinki Airport 8.7 Excellent Based on 501 reviews It was perfect the moment when I stepped in the hotel till the last min I checked out. The staff were super helpful, took the effort to provide me details to Tallinn at 4am. . Provided me with all the details that I need to know. Always smiling and nice greetings. The room is fantastic, very spacious and clean. The toilet is awesome. It has everything that I need. It is a good location if you are only staying for a few nights in Helsinki. Airport shuttle takes you all the way to the city centre and it is very convenient. I will defintely stay there again, no second thoughts. Show more Jasmin , Singapore Arctic TreeHouse Hotel 7.7 Very good Based on 14 reviews Radisson Blu Plaza Hotel Helsinki 8.7 Excellent Based on 158 reviews This was my second stay, and it was even better than my first! Two reasons: I just checked out of the Sokos Presidentti, and the comparison between our room in the Sokos and our room in the Radisson was like night and day! And I think they have two wings, with two sets of elevators, and one wing is OK (my last visit), and the other wing (this visit) has big, lovely rooms. Maybe I accidentally got a superior room this stay, and a standard room last trip. It was great! Overall, it's hard to fault this hotel, and it's probably a good first choice for a downtown Helsinki hotel. Show more gwyn , United Kingdom Anna Hotel 8 Very good Based on 186 reviews Hotel is centrally located, about 15 min walk from city centre. There are kiosk, night shops and some restaurant in the area. Single room is not big but a normal size for a budget hotel. Room has free wifi, tv and minibar. Prices are also quite cheap for hotel standard (EUR 2 for a can of coca cola). In short good value for money ! Show more Didon , Indonesia Santa's Igloos Arctic Circle 8.5 Excellent Based on 17 reviews Hotel Inari 8.7 Excellent Based on 84 reviews (1)No lifts provided and I have to take my two heavy luggages up two levels. (2) Wifi reception is poor due to narrow broadband with large nos. of guests using it. Besides, the wifi system was down for more than one day though I have informed the reception immediately. (3) Except I told the staff the malfunction of wifi system, they are helpful and nice. Show more WAI , Hong Kong Hilton Helsinki Strand 8.2 Excellent Based on 170 reviews I stayed at this location for 2 night and thoroughly enjoyed my stay. The staff are so friendly and speak excellent english. There is a buffet available on saturdays for 29 euros... food tasted good. . The gym is tiny. there are like 2 upper body weigh machines and 2 legs machines. The picture advertised on the website makes it look so much bigger. the pool is not heated and bloody freezing and the saunas are small and can only be used certain hours. . Overall it is about 15-20min walk to the centre of town. 20min to the olympic standard and has excellent rooms. the rooms are big and spacious just like a hilton should be. the bed is very comfy and the bathroom is clean and tidy. . I recommend this stay as it was cheap at the time i went Show more Glenn , Australia Hotel Klaus K 8.3 Excellent Based on 118 reviews Very chic looking place well designed though you must get your luggage up a set of stairs if there is no bell man present. Rooms are satisfactory visually, but the air conditioning is actually an air cooling system, which is a fancy way of saying that the hotel sets a temperature and you can control within 1 or 2 degrees of their setting, or so they say. With the record summer heat in Europe, I made it all of 3 hours before I could not longer withstand the 25 degree heat in the room. I checked out and was charged a 20 Euro cleaning fee. Staff was as helpful as possible. Show more paul , United States Arctic Glass Igloos 8 Very good Based on 13 reviews Hotel Haven 9 Excellent Based on 88 reviews Very nice room with big bathroom. Reception staff extremely friendly. Staff at the breakfast were not friendly. . they didn´t automaticly help with buggies and one didn´t feel welcome to their restaurant. Breakfast in it self was really tasty but everything was all the time finished and replenishment was slow! That was really the only downside of this hotel. Show more veera , Finland Radisson Blu Royal Hotel Helsinki 8.3 Excellent Based on 105 reviews The hotel is well located and looks very smart from the outside. But the Roma are small and poky, very basically furnished and could do with a good spring clean and some TLC. There are few amenities and the breakfast is not particularly good value for the high price. Check in and check out was quite slow - not enough staff on duty at reception. It was handy for our needs but wouldn't rush back here again. Show more Philip , United Kingdom Radisson Blu Seaside Hotel Helsinki 8.1 Excellent Based on 118 reviews We had only a 25hr stopover in Helsinki and this hotel was in a nice location by the sea and only a 10 min walk to all the city attractions. The breakfast was amazing - a huge selection of delicious food. The room was clean, bed was comfortable and service was great. It took us 1hr by public transport to get there from the airport - 35 min on bus 615, 5 min walk to Hakaneima metro, about 4 stops then walk 10 min walk to hotel. If you have kids, heavy luggage or are not very fit, I would suggest you take a cab here. Once at the hotel is easy to walk everywhere I would recommend this hotel. Show more Danielle , Australia Holiday Inn Helsinki City Centre 8.4 Excellent Based on 260 reviews Comfortable Hotel, with helpful staff. Coffee and tea are provided in the room. There is underground supermarket in the train station so can buy everything there. Sauna is available to use free of charge. Wifi is extra 2.8 Euro, not a lot but it is frustrated to use because username and password are not easy to put in and must try at least twice before can lock on. Room key is also another annoying item, it's an art to insert the key. Even the staff admit that and there is nothing they can do. Show more chongkonnee , Thailand Clarion Hotel Helsinki Airport 8.9 Excellent Based on 20 reviews Hotel Kämp 8.8 Excellent Based on 48 reviews Hotel Arthur 7.7 Very good Based on 301 reviews since i was travelling alone and only needed a room for one night, i chose arthur for 60€. the staff was very friendly and lication ok, but the rooms. .. not ok. very small room and especially the shower! i am very small myself but even i couldn't use the shower curtain because it took too much space from the tiny shower corner. the restaurant was a little bit shabby and had an odd smell. but the fish soup was great and only! if you're looking for a cheap room and don't have any expectations, i guess arthur is your choice. but next time i will definitely spend more and choose another hotel. Show more Lisa , Finland Airport Hotel Bonus Inn 7.7 Very good Based on 67 reviews We stayed there in late July when it was very hot and humid. Our room did not have air conditioning or even a fan. The lobby and halls did but not our room.. There wasn't any bar soap, shampoo or lotions. And of course, no wash cloths, which is an unknown item to Europeans. The restaurant was open for dinner when we arrived until 11:00 pm and was very good. However, we were late for the breakfast buffet which ended at 9:30 am and the restaurant was closed. The free shuttle service to the airport was a plus. Show more Ann , United States Hotelli Kultahippu 8.2 Excellent Based on 62 reviews Ivalo is pretty small, so within town everything is within walking distance. Opposite the hotel is a supermarket and alko. If you do not want to have your meals at the hotel, there are a few food options nearby. Hotel is about 10 min taxi ride from the airport (about 23- 25 Euros). Rooms were cosy, clean and comfortable. Has cable TV but limited channels. Breakfast was decent, typical finnish hotel breakfast. Staff were friendly. Show more Edwin , Singapore Glo Hotel Art 8.2 Excellent Based on 69 reviews Hotel showed great hospitality, the staff was helpful, and there was even a sleep menu where one could choose from different types of pillows! Room was nice, clean and well-designed, but a little warm though (perhaps better than being cold). Breakfast was good and had a healthy spread of food. Hotel was within walking distance from the main train station, shopping areas, design district and it was easy to get the shuttle bus to the airport. Overall, highly recommended!!!! Show more PEI , Singapore Crowne Plaza Helsinki 8.4 Excellent Based on 66 reviews Nice design all over, the room was clean and attractive, very good bed, nice bathroom with tub/shower combination, free Internet access. The hotel looked freshly renovated, staff was friendly and it is close to the city center (10 min walk), the Sibelius Park (ditto), and there is another-park-with-lake right across the street. There are several nice restaurants right around the corner. The airport shuttle stops right outside, but you should tell the driver that you want this hotel because they only list the next-door Scandic Hotel (go figure). Show more Unni , Norway Hotel F6 9.2 Exceptional Based on 7 reviews Scandic Grand Marina 8.2 Excellent Based on 108 reviews It would be my first choice to stay there if coming back to Helsinki but outside the hotel in the local area there is not much. The local bar and local shop are both noticeably extremely expensive - it seems to me to be everything on that island is. However, it is well connected to the main land and tram 4 serves it well. There is only a short walk to the promanade and a market is available some days. Show more Kevin , United Kingdom Tradition Hotel Kultahovi Inari 8.3 Excellent Based on 37 reviews We spent two nights in this hotel. We chose this hotel because it is near Inari lake (Next to Hotel Inari) and easy to chase northern light. We are so lucky and two nights also caught the northern light. We have our own car and it is convenience to park. The room is quite small but everything is well equipped. Computer is available in the corridor which is very important to check the Northern light photos. I will recommend this hotel! Show more HiuChi , Hong Kong Glo Hotel Kluuvi 8.8 Excellent Based on 198 reviews I was in Helsinki for a wedding and had a fantastic stay at Glo. We cheked in 6 hours early and the staff were helpful in getting us a room and even upgrading. Pay the extra for the 3 different sauna's (30 euros / night I believe). We needed to get somewhere for a couple of hours and the staff gave us the Glo mini car FREE of charge and even told us they would pay for the gas. They have bikes for free as well, and internet and computer for free in the lobby. The room was incredible, large, comfortable, modern - I would recommend this hotel to ANYONE, I have stayed in a lot of nice hotels, but this is definitely in the top 3! Show more Matthew , Canada Cumulus City Kaisaniemi Helsinki 8 Very good Based on 72 reviews this hotel is situated in a very central of helsinki but also in the very quiet corner. so it won't be too busy. nice size hotel, friendly staffs, nice food. the room was really nice and clean. soft bed and extra pillows always available. free internet connection with the wire. the most complicated thing i found is how to work the lift with the card. the guests seem to sharing this same problems. a lot of mature guests (+60 years old) around (though i am not quite sure whether this is their marketing). there is also the luggage room available. Show more Tanatchaporn , Thailand Hotel Seurahuone Helsinki 8.2 Excellent Based on 76 reviews I thought this hotel is excellent! I am staying here for 1 night and decided to check the reviews which were shocking. Firstly, its still summer time and the weather is pretty cooling definitely. In any case, theres a window that i can open for cool air. Perhaps some rooms have no windows? Secondly, mine was just a basic room and definitely i wasnt told about an upgrade. For a solo traveler, the room size was perfect with nice furnishings. The windows look out to the main street which was perfect. The only cons would be 1)The tiny bathroom but again, good enough for me. 2)No water provided and no drinks inside the fridge- I had nothing to drink in the middle of the night. In all, i have no complaints. Show more Kah , Singapore Original Sokos Hotel Helsinki 7.9 Very good Based on 113 reviews We enjoyed our stay in this nice hotel located very close to the central railway system. It is surrounded by pedestrian walking areas and excellent shopping and restaurants. Also a short walk to the waterfront. The room (we had a triple) was large with a very large bathroom, comfortable, and reasonably quiet. Would stay there again. Access to the railway station meant we could use a bus to get to the airport which saved a great deal of money without giving up much convenience. Show more william , Canada Santa Claus Holiday Village 8.6 Excellent Based on 168 reviews We can't get Wi-Fi in our room as the reception said that the server in our room area was broken and we can only gain Internet access at the restaurant area. Private sauna room is good, very small kitchen area with microwave stove, for coffee and tea, the room is clean and spacious. However, the setting of the furniture is strange. The TV was on the wall immediately above our pillows. The sofa was not facing the TV and the chairs of the dining table were not facing the TV either. If one has to watch TV, he/she must turn his/her back to watch!
